name: Extreme Highway Driving Challe
description:
Here you have to drive your car on highway to compete a traffic rush. Driving in traffic has never been easy. This game is an out class real racing in car. Let’s drive a car with furious and crazy speed. Show real racing fever to all the racing rivals by driving your express car with boosting speed.

Features:
New way of highway racing.
Real city car auto racing.
New and ultimate super car collection.
Real racing and highway stunts.
Crazy features and dynamic control.
